Treasury Stock: treasury stock retired cost method amount

stock issued during period value new issues

stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value

adjustments related to tax withholding for share based compensation

adjustments of permanent noncontrolling interest in subsidiaries to liquidation value

increase decrease in permanent noncontrolling interest in subsidiaries
